name: UITapGestureRecognizer
desc: A discrete gesture recognizer that interprets single or multiple taps.

items.name: var buttonMaskRequired: UIEvent.ButtonMask
items.desc: The bit mask of the buttons the user must press for gesture recognition.

items.name: var numberOfTapsRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of taps necessary for gesture recognition.

items.name: var numberOfTouchesRequired: Int
items.desc: The number of fingers that the user must tap for gesture recognition.
